summary: The diff implements most of the requested requirements. REQ-62 (tooth logo footer trigger), REQ-63 (admin dashboard consolidation), REQ-64 (frictionless booking), REQ-65 (brand name reload), REQ-66 (cursor removal), REQ-67 (mesh gradient), REQ-68 (scroll reveal), REQ-69 (before/after slider), and REQ-70 (service card glow) are all at least partially addressed. However, several specific acceptance criteria have gaps or cannot be confirmed from the diff. The HiddenAdminTrigger removal from App.tsx cannot be fully confirmed since App.tsx is truncated. The Admin Dashboard consolidation into a single view is questionable since separate admin sub-pages still exist. The AdminGuard still uses Internet Identity. Some AC items are confirmed; others lack evidence.

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove the existing HiddenAdminTrigger invisible hit-box component from App.tsx and no longer present in the DOM.
missing_requirements.reason: App.tsx is truncated and does not explicitly show the removal of HiddenAdminTrigger. Cannot confirm it is gone from the DOM.

missing_requirements.requirement: Admin Dashboard consolidates all three capabilities (appointments table, clinic status toggle, service manager CMS) in a single accessible view.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows separate admin sub-pages (Appointments, ServiceManager, ContentManager, etc.) still exist as distinct routes. The Dashboard page content is not shown in the diff to confirm all three are consolidated there.

missing_requirements.requirement: All Book Appointment / Book Now buttons on DentalImplantsDetail, InvisalignDetail, LaserDentistryDetail, PediatricDentistryDetail, SmileMakeoverDetail, and ServiceDetail pages open the frictionless dialog directly.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff only shows HeroSection and Header updated with booking dialogs. No evidence of the 5 service detail pages or ServiceDetail being updated.

missing_requirements.requirement: Images must start at scale(0.85) with opacity 0 and zoom in to natural size with fade-in on scroll entry.
missing_requirements.reason: DoctorProfile uses scale-90 (scale(0.9)) rather than the specified scale(0.85).

hallucinated_features.description: AdminGuard component that gates admin pages behind Internet Identity authentication and isCallerAdmin check, redirecting to /access-denied if not authenticated.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request does not request Internet Identity-based admin guards. Admin access should be handled solely by the HiddenAdminLoginModal with username/password credentials. No such guard was requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Separate admin sub-page routes for /admin/appointments, /admin/content, /admin/doctors, /admin/service-manager, /admin/review-approver with distinct page components.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-63 specifies consolidating all admin capabilities into a single dashboard view or tabs within the admin panel. Creating multiple separate full routes fragments the consolidated dashboard requirement beyond what was requested.
